trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs> contains the <xref:System.Exception> that caused the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.Error?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
This class provides the <xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs.GetException%2A> method to retrieve the exception.
trans-unit.target: 此类提供<xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs.GetException%2A>方法来检索该异常。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new instance of <xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs> and initializes it with an <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建的新实例<xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs>并初始化它与<xref:System.Exception>。

trans-unit.source: Then the example calls <xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs.GetException%2A> to retrieve the <xref:System.Exception> and display the error message.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例调用<xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs.GetException%2A>检索<xref:System.Exception>并显示错误消息。

trans-unit.source: There is no form associated with this code.
trans-unit.target: 没有与此代码没有任何窗体。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a FileSystemWatcher to monitor file changes (creates, deletes, renames, changes) occurring on a disk drive.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建 FileSystemWatcher 来监视文件的更改 （创建、 删除、 重命名、 更改） 磁盘驱动器上发生。

trans-unit.source: The example also shows how to properly receive error notifications.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示如何正确接收错误通知。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that represents the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 表示已发生的错误的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new instance of <xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs> and initializes it with an <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建的新实例<xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs>并初始化它与<xref:System.Exception>。

trans-unit.source: Then the example calls <xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs.GetException%2A> to retrieve the <xref:System.Exception> and display the error message.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该示例调用<xref:System.IO.ErrorEventArgs.GetException%2A>检索<xref:System.Exception>并显示错误消息。

trans-unit.source: There is no form associated with this code.
trans-unit.target: 没有与此代码没有任何窗体。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that represents the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示已发生的错误的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that represents the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 表示已发生的错误的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" />。
